user.title: Environment Canada: Location and language
user.description:
You can specify a location using either a station code or latitude/longitude coordinates.

Default behavior: If no station code is entered, the system uses the latitude/longitude values configured in your Home Assistant installation.

Station code format: Station codes follow the format "s0000123" or simply "123".

Find station codes at https://dd.weather.gc.ca/today/citypage_weather/docs/site_list_towns_en.csv.
